title: (x) Home Helpers - Park Avenue, Cochin {Marc O}
content:
Sorry, can't help you with the main ID, but I'll take the bonus points. "Helpers" is set in Cochin Bold.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/cochin/bold/testdrive.html?s=Helpers&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525002130/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/cochin/bold/testdrive.html?s=Helpers&p=48)
author: marcox

comments.content:
Maybe I can help after all: "Home" is set in Park Avenue.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/park-avenue/park-avenue/testdrive.html?s=Home&p=60](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525002130/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/park-avenue/park-avenue/testdrive.html?s=Home&p=60)
